Title: Hacker
Writer: Atakhan (Story Consultant), Akan Satayev (story), Sanzhar Sultan (screenplay), Timur Zhaksylykov
Actors: Callan McAuliffe, Lorraine Nicholson, Daniel Eric Gold, Clifton Collins Jr.
Plot: With the help of his new friends Alex Danyliuk turns to a life of crime and identity theft.
Country: USA, Thailand, Kazakhstan, Hong Kong, Canada
